"Damn Autobots" Caliburst shrieked, as they flew through the patch of
explosive shells. He knew Slugslinger was to low on energy to do any
fancy maneuvers, heck, they probably wouldnt make it to the ground in
one piece.

Then as if to accent SLugslinger's thoughts, Grimlock fired another
blast of super heated laser breath, which rocked Slugslinger, and put a
hole in his wing. Grimlock looked back at Dion smugly.

"That how we do it. Not bad for autobot." Grimlock snarled down.

Slugslinger tried to regain his ballance, and circle back, as not to
leave Tremor alone, but Strafe was just trying not to go down, and both
jets collided, creating a huge metal grinding on metal noise, as they
ripped into each other, and then headed towards the rock hard ground.
They both landed unpleasantly, as Slugslinger tried to transform, but
his body not responding. Caliburst did however, and fired his laser at
the Transforming Strafe, who was still dizy from the crash.

The impact of the laser sent Strafe falling backwards, a smoking wound
on his chest, as he hit the ground. Caliburst then turned to
Slugslinger. 

"Where are you hurt?" he asked visibly worried, but not so much about
Slugslinger, as the hord of Autobots.
______________________________________________________________________

Nightmare listened to the message. If his helmet like face was capable
of showing emotion, he would have been very interested.

"Do ya hear that, a fight." Jagged snarled excitedly. "We should go, and
win it for the D.E.D."

Nightmare simply nodded his head. This was the chance of a lifetime for
his military training, and Jagged could use some experience. He stepped
back, and transformed into his huge demonic horse mode. Stomping his
hooves on the ground, causing the base to shake. Jagged climbed up on
the metalic saddle, and grabbed hold of two of the spikes on Nightmares
neck, as the huge horse began to flap his metalic wings, to take off.
